@bbcquestiontime @DavidLammy @nadhimzahawi @nadhimzahawi - these the are #Facts (not @BBCNews) https://t.co/C0MJVzS2JN. 
Rather than trying to shout down other panellists might be worthwhile studying this #trust #COVID19
